parameters.name: NewResourceGroupId
parameters.description: The ID of the resource group to which you want to move the resource.

parameters.name: RegionId
parameters.description: The region ID of the Classic Load Balancer (CLB) instance.

parameters.name: ResourceId
parameters.description: The ID of the resource for which you want to modify the resource group.

parameters.name: ResourceType
parameters.description:
The type of the resource. Valid values:

*   **loadbalancer**: a CLB instance
*   **certificate**: a certificate
*   **acl**: an access control list (ACL)

parameters.name: access_key_id
parameters.description: The AccessKey ID provided to you by Alibaba Cloud for accessing the service.
